title: Semantic Search
description: Find related content using natural language queries with AI-powered semantic understanding

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.similarityHint: Higher values return more precise matches but fewer results
advanced.dossierTypesHint: Leave empty to search all dossier types
advanced.includeFulltextHint: Combine semantic search with traditional keyword matching for broader coverage
advanced.includeMetadataHint: Return additional entity metadata like tags, status, and relationships

results.title: {{count}} result found
results.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your search query or lowering the similarity threshold

errors.serviceUnavailable: Semantic search service is temporarily unavailable
errors.noEntityTypes: Please select at least one entity type

hints.naturalLanguage: Use natural language queries like "What are our positions on climate change?" or "Find meetings with Saudi officials"
hints.arabicSupport: Arabic queries are fully supported - try searching in Arabic for better results in Arabic content
hints.hybridMode: Enable hybrid mode to combine semantic understanding with exact keyword matching

examples.title: Example Queries
examples.query1: International trade agreements with Asian countries
examples.query2: Climate policy positions and related engagements
